transcript:
Customer: Hello, ha regarding. Hello.
Executive: Hello, ha ji very good morning sir, Priyanka baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Haa regarding.
Hello. Sir regarding for your services. I just discuss you about you are raising the concern on the 7th of November regarding your services. So what was the issue sir you are facing related to the services sir?
Customer: I am not getting any enquiries from IndiaMART.
Executive: Okay. You are not getting enquiries from IndiaMART.
Customer: Regularly I am receiving calls from IndiaMART office only. I am not getting any customer calls or buyleads or relevant buyleads.
Executive: I just ask you the one thing in the month of November you are getting the one buyer call. What was the response over the call sir?
Customer: Yeah, that one that one already someone stopped and ready put that one. I have got that one.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ha yes. Same our company person only they talked already. Actually I have got that enquiry.
Executive: Okay, your company person talked with the buyer. Yeah yeah already I just already ready. I have got this order also.
Customer: Great, great. Really appreciated you sir you are getting the order also. So I just ask you the one thing you are listed with us very long time if we talk about from the month of July right? You are dealing in a solar water heater or on grid solar power system right? This is your product line sir?
Customer: Yes yes both. Okay.
Executive: So I just ask you the one thing you are dealing in a all India or a specific for your location if we talk about this.
Customer: Our location only madam.
Executive: Our location only. Matlab mostly your preferred location is Bangalore if I am not wrong.
Customer: Yes yes correct.
Executive: Okay because mostly you are consuming the lead from the Bangalore location only. So I just suggest you the one thing because in a last from the month of July you are getting the maturity because you have five six seven users are provided the review and rating on your catalog with your product. So you are getting the maturity or you are having a issue related to the maturity also.
Customer: I am not getting any relevant enquiry not closing that one.
Executive: Okay. Bangalore and so quantity low quantity.
Previously I have taken two times with IndiaMART.
Okay.
Customer: Too much enquiries too much business I have done. Nowadays no not happening nothing. Nothing will happen.
Executive: I understand but this is my suggestion to you pehle aap IndiaMART chalate the to you are promoting your company as a trusted verified supplier if I am not wrong.
Customer: Nahi nahi pehla pehla ek saal mein liya tha maine firstly MDC liya tha. MDC ke baad maine do saal mein wo isko verified supplier usko liya tha.
Executive: Trusted supplier mein fir aapne convert kiya.
Customer: Trusted liya tha wo do saal mein. Us saal mein bhi mujhe first time liya tha jo mujhe 12 lakh ka business hua tha wo next time do saal ka liya tha usse bhi around 12 to 14 lakh ka utna hi business hua hai mujhe.
Executive: Great great.
Customer: Actually first pehle saal mein bahut acha hua. Next saal mein kuch nahi. Abhi abhi bhi kuch nahi.
Executive: Okay but mera aapko ye kehna tha if you are getting a bad kind of a business from IndiaMART so you just promote your company because you are as a show in a basic service if you promoted your company as a trusted verified supplier.
Customer: Nahi madam abhi abhi abhi dekhiye abhi IndiaMART mein koi ja raha nahi hai. Isiliye mujhe thodi dikkat ho raha hai. Abhi mera hamare office se hi office se bhi Google ka liya hai unhone around 12 to 15 enquiries daily generate hota hai.
Usme teen char to close hota hi hai.
Executive: Sir agar aap IndiaMART se bhi karoge na to benefit aapka hi hai because agar aap IndiaMART mein already maturity uthaoge.
Customer: Nahi nahi IndiaMART mein jayega kaun? Mujhe abhi abhi kuch mujhe chahiye to main Google karunga to wo show karega wo do teen vendor wahi rahega wo sponsor rehta hai wahi rahega. IndiaMART aayega niche.
Executive: Sir agar aap Google pe bhi jaoge aur aap koi bhi product search karoge to sabse pehle IndiaMART aata hai.
Customer: Agar just for example main aapka product koi bhi search karte ho maine solar power system main search kiya.
Executive: Dekhenge dekhenge aap thoda thoda wo aapko aapko ho jaye thoda dekhiye hamara bhi catalog.
Executive: Dekhiye main chahta hu.
Customer: Main call karta hu aapko thoda main busy hu.
Executive: Tension not but mera aap se ek request tha aapka ki concern raise hai isko main yaha se close karungi baki aap hume positive response dijiyega mail pe baki aapki services hum properly dekh rahe hain aur kisi bhi tarah ka koi problem hoga usko uska solution hum karke denge aap hamare purane client ho aur aap itne time se ho already aapne business generate bhi kiya hua hai to aapko to idea hoga na sir ki business to aapko milega.
Customer: Wahi wahi wahi usi liye usi liye bol raha hu main koi aapko aapke office se call call karta hai main response nahi de raha hu usi liye.
Executive: Okay. Kyunki aap.
Customer: Main wo do teen logon ko main bol bhi diya hu mujhe sikhane ki koshish mat kijiye.
Executive: Bilkul sir main aapko kaun batayega bilkul correct hai. To isiliye main aap se request kar rahi hu ki aapko aage koi bhi concern aata hai aap please mera number note kar lijiye mujhe batayega aapko service team se koi problem nahi aayegi aur aapne bataya bhi ki jaise aapko jo buyer call aaya usme bhi aapne mature kiya hai it's really appreciated you sir ki aapki team ne.
Customer: Main pehla pehla bahut bahut sare calls aate the. Maine abhi aapko maine ye nahi liya tha tariff maine liya tha nahi liya tha bhi thoda enquiries mujhe aaya tha us time bhi. Abhi main lene ke baad bhi koi enquiries nahi kuch nahi bola tha.
Executive: But mera aap se ek request hoga thoda sa aur agar active rahenge to jyada best rahega jaise ki.
Customer: Active hi rehta hu madam sada bhar mobile mein hi rehta hu.
Executive: Seven days nine days ki activity hai sir seven days mein three days ki wo aur acha business milega. Thank you so much sir please aap positive response provide kariyega request hai aap se sir.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Ha ji thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough inquiries from IndiaMART.

- Receiving calls only from IndiaMART office.

- Low quantity of leads from Bangalore.

- Business has decreased compared to previous years.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive highlighted customer's maturity in closing a buylead.

- Executive suggested promoting company as trusted supplier.

- Executive offered direct contact for future concerns.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide positive response via mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, google, business
